title: Job
description:
Queenbee Job.

A Job is an object to submit a list of arguments to execute a Queenbee recipe.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source url for downloading the recipe.

name.title: Name
name.description: An optional name for this job. This name will be used a the display name for the run.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Optional user data as a dictionary. User data is for user reference only and will not be used in the execution of the job.

JobArgument.title: JobArgument
JobArgument.description: Job argument is an argument input for arguments which are not files or folders.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.

name.title: Name
name.description: Argument name. The name must match one of the input names from Job's DAG template.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the job argument.

HTTP.title: HTTP
HTTP.description:
HTTP Source

A web HTTP to an FTP server or an API for example.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.

url.title: Url
url.description: For a HTTP endpoint this can be http://climate.onebuilding.org.

S3.title: S3
S3.description:
S3 Source

An S3 bucket artifact Source.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.

key.title: Key
key.description: The path inside the bucket to source artifacts from.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint to reach the S3 bucket.

bucket.title: Bucket
bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket on the host server.

credentials_path.title: Credentials Path
credentials_path.description: Path to the file holding the AccessKey and SecretAccessKey to authenticate to the bucket. Assumes public bucket access if none are specified.

ProjectFolder.title: ProjectFolder
ProjectFolder.description:
Project Folder Source

This is the path to a folder where files and folders can be sourced. In the context
of a desktop run Workflow this folder will correspond to a local folder. In the
context of a workflow run on Pollination this folder will correspond to a Project
scoped folder.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path to a folder where files and folders can be sourced. For a local filesystem this can be "C:\Users\me\jobs\test".

JobPathArgument.title: JobPathArgument
JobPathArgument.description: BaseModel with functionality to return the object as a yaml string.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.

name.title: Name
name.description: Argument name. The name must match one of the input names from Job's template which can be a function or DAG.

source.title: Source
source.description: The path to source the file from.
